newsitem.title: MEXICO: ABN Amro starts ICA as buy.
newsitem.headline: ABN Amro starts ICA as buy.

text.p: ABN Amro Bank has initiated coverage of Mexican construction company Empresas ICA with a buy recommendation, the company said in a research report on Thursday.

--"We believe shares warrant a multiple of 10.6 times EV/ EBITDA, which leads us to a price target of $20 per ADS, representing 34 pct upside potential," analyst Carlos Perezalonso wrote in the report.

--"A final toll-road restructuring programme is about to be announced by the Mexican government. The effect is likely to be a dramatic improvement in ICA's cash position and the removal of a significant impediment to earnings growth," he added.
